itemTooltip.elemental-items.fire_shard: This item can instantly spawn fire and maybe can make new tools.
itemTooltip.elemental-items.water_shard: This item can instantly spawn water and maybe can make new tools.
itemTooltip.elemental-items.lightning_sh: This item can instantly spawn lightning and maybe can make new tools.
itemTooltip.elemental-items.converter: This block is useless on its own. Maybe you can infuse it with something.
itemTooltip.elemental-items.essence: This item feels very powerful but is useless on its own. Maybe you can infuse it with something.
